House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07947
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO PROVIDE FOR A STUDY AND FOR DEMONSTRATION PROJECTS REGARDING CASES OF HEPATITIS C AMONG FIREFIGHTERS, PARAMEDICS, EMERGENCY MEDICAL TECHNICIANS AND OTHER EMERGENCY RESPONSE EMPLOYEES
ABSTRACT : Intends to provide programs to prevent emergency response employees from acquiring Hepatitis C (a viral infection that causes liver inflammation, sometimes leading to serious liver damage). Seeks to establish a system, training, protocol and scientific research and medical treatment for this virus so that our said personnel will be able to deploy their functions without sacrificing their precious health.
ALIAS NAME : “Emergency Response Employees Disease Protection Act”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-24
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HEALTH ON 2018-08-01
